title: Expert Course on Gaze-Tracking-Based Task Performance Diagnosis and Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Assignment Design, Data Visualization Interpretation Skills, Foundational Knowledge of Cognitive Science
context.additional_context: Course designed for science practitioners to utilize eye-tracking technology in experimental task design and evaluation processes

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose task performance processes with 80% accuracy by analyzing eye-movement displays.
Learners can propose at least three task difficulty adjustment plans based on eye-tracking data.
Learners can evaluate cognitive strategies of learners at least three times through eye-pattern analysis in real science experiment tasks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
